column5: Spacious room on the ground floor in large older house near downtown Dallas offers a private entrance from the front porch, a private bathroom with walk-in shower and large tub, and walk-in closets. Access to the rest of the house (kitchen, w/d) included. Gated home, high speed wifi included. Perfect for couples, solo traveler, students, or traveling professionals. Plenty of privacy and convenient to downtown Dallas. One pet allowed.
column8: Prvt room & Bath within larger house
